text: I'm going to show you a picture. And in the picture there are some things going on. I want you to just look at the picture and describe to me any action you see taking place. Anything you see happening. The kids are swiping some cookies there and the stool is upsetting. And the girls tell him to be quiet so his mother over there washing dishes and the sinks are overflowing. And the window is up. And I don't see much
